<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">ad91965c68ed41100e4333e99a403598</macroponent><name>CreateMyListRecord</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**

* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    console.log("CreateMyListRecord");
    console.log("myListData: ", api.state.myListData);
    // let templateFields = "columns=" + api.state.myListData.columns + "^table=" + api.state.myListData.table + "^active=" + api.state.myListData.active + "^title=" + api.state.myListData.name + "^condition=" + api.state.myListData.condition.replaceAll("^", "^^");
    // console.log("myListData templateFields: ", templateFields);

    //     columns: api.state.myListData.columns, 
    //     table: api.state.myListData.table, 
    //     active: api.state.myListData.active, 
    //     title: api.state.myListData.name, 
    //     condition: api.state.myListData.condition
    // };
    // console.log("myListData postBody: ", postBody);
    api.data.rest_create_my_workspace_list_1.execute({
        "columns": api.state.myListData.columns,
        "table": api.state.myListData.table,
        "active": api.state.myListData.active,
        "title": api.state.myListData.name,
        "condition": api.state.myListData.condition,
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>optimiz</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-19 13:33:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>69996d3d47e38d10d0bc5c62e36d4328</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CreateMyListRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Optimiz AIOps Workspace" source="x_snc_optimiz_wo_0">2071525c87ed411007570d0d0ebb35aa</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Optimiz AIOps Workspace">2071525c87ed411007570d0d0ebb35aa</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_69996d3d47e38d10d0bc5c62e36d4328</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>optimiz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-19 17:18:26</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
